Race.SpecificTitle: School District No. 5 -- 12.63 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
School District No. 5 Proposition
(Millage Continuation)

Summary:  Authority for School District No. 5 to continue to levy a 10 year, 12.63 mills property tax for the purpose of constructing, operating and maintaining school houses and buildings.
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 5 of the Parish of Allen, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of twelve and sixty-three hundredths (12.63) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $293,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2020, for the purpose of constructing, operating and maintaining school houses and buildings in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Rec. Dist. No. 1 -- 3.10 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Recreation District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 3.10 mills tax continuation for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and operating recreational facilities for Recreation District No. 1 (Oakdale), including the acquisition of equipment therefor.
Race.FullText: Shall Recreation District No. 1 of the Parish of Allen, State of Louisiana (Oakdale) (the "District") be authorized to levy and collect a tax of three and ten-hundredths (3.10) mills (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of said tax for one entire year being $74,100) on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, maintaining and operating recreational facilities for said District, including the acquisition of equipment therefor?
